explanation: [0-0] The video shows a cracked iPad screen, lit up and displaying the time 20:14, along with some app icons. At the bottom of the screen, the text "iPad 10.2 touch" is visible, along with fingers with purple nail polish.

[0-3] Next, a woman with long, blonde, curly hair appears in the frame. She is standing in front of a table with a blue mat on it, wearing a black top with white polka dots and a silver heart necklace. She has colorful nail polish on and is holding the iPad, examining the extent of the damage. There are several layers of black storage boxes in the background.
